Articles.Content:
So this bug has happend to me a few times, I try to launch a rocket but when i click launch it says that my rocket is too big to launch even though it's maxed out. I have fixed in the past by just creating a new save and coping the craft file across but i dont want to do that as i have a fair few crafts on the go. Does anyone know a fix.

Some pics: 

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1iRMXutTSpzZrURdsFYi0H193ROpZxGP5

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1_Mn7EHAP-G6szdOvk4S7Tj0zGwXUQH72

https://drive.google.com/open?id=16HsA5buamh_NsAkNj396IgTI40XksKRy

Thanks

Edit: realised i was CKAN cloning from 1.8 so fixed that and it this bug went away, lost loads of crafts though so not a real fix

Edited April 14, 2020 by FatBoySlim458

Try upgrading the launch pad.  You need a level 3 launchpad to be able to launch that big of a rocket.

Edited April 14, 2020 by RoninFrog
